name: Larry The Great Duck (LTGD)
description:
This is a Jam Game for the LTGD Jam. You can play as Larry, an ordinary duck, that is now great.

There is WASD movement as well as arrow key. You can smash pesky enemies with your double jump, as it sends an egg flying out of your bum.

The music and art were made by me, the music is sadly recycled as that junk is hard to make. If I continue this project, better music is in order.

Thank you for reading/playing my game, it means a lot.
